page.title: 02WEATHER IN PENISTONE
page.content:
Part of Penistone's{ecology}is of course its weather.Penistone and its surrounding villages has more than 60% over cast weather.Penistone is surrounded by the Pennine Hills so {rain}is enevitable. Our winters are very harsh and a foot of{snow}is not uncommon.A good summer is often followed by a bad winter.Last winter (1984) was very mild although we had a fairly good summer. At my school Penistone Grammar we have snow drills, this when the snow gets so bad our homes may be cut off. This is mainly for people living in out-lying villages. In short Pennine weather is generally bad.
.
